description:
Founded in 1973, the Turley Law Firm in Dallas, Texas, has provided exceptional, effective representation to innocent accident victims and their families throughout the greater Dallas metro area and all across the state for more than 46 years. During that time, we have become the trusted source for many during their most dire times of need. We have also achieved unprecedented success helping our clients obtain the maximum amount of compensation they deserve for the injuries and losses they suffered as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Focusing on all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, the attorneys at our law firm possess an extensive amount of knowledge and experience to help increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you deserve efficiently. We have on our team attorneys board-certified in personal injury trial law by the Texas Board of Legal Specialization, so you can count on us to deliver the latest, most relevant advice and counsel for your matter with the utmost integrity and confidence.

Recognized for our impeccable professionalism and exceptional legal abilities, we have earned AV Preeminent peer review ratings* from Martindale-Hubbell and recognition from Best Lawyers in personal injury litigation, and our law firm has received numerous positive reviews and testimonials from our satisfied clients. Licensed to practice before all U.S. district and appellate courts in our region, including the U.S. Supreme Court, we are fully prepared to take your matter to the highest levels if necessary.

Whether your suffering is the result of a motor vehicle accident, an aviation accident, a construction accident, a dangerous or defective product, an act of medical malpractice or any other type of preventable tragedy, you can begin the process of retaining the quality, personalized counsel you need by contacting the Turley Law Firm and taking advantage of our free initial consultation.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.

Best Lawyers® and The Best Lawyers in America© are registered trademarks of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC. The names, logo, and database are protected under the trademark, copyright, and fair use laws of the United States of America. Any use of name, including in electronic form, must be made only by permission and under the guidelines of BL Rankings, LLC d/b/a Best Lawyers and Co., LLC.
